Recommendations: The building floor plan may be displayed or posted in conspicuous places in the buildings.
Signages of entry and exit in the first floor and second floor of the buildings may be made available and visible.
More fire extinguishers may be mounted and be accessible in the building. Firefighting equipment like fire hose may be made available in the building of the college.
Pest control inspection may be done periodically.
Trash bins may be more available in the corridors and classrooms. Anti-littering campaign may be implemented to maintain cleanliness of the classrooms and surroundings.
Pathway intended for persons with disability (PWD) may have the railings.
Students may be given responsibility in the maintenance and beautification of classrooms.
Lounge in the faculty rooms may be made available.
